title: The Dumb Ones
description: You ever meet someone so dumb, you wonder how they dress themselves in the morning? That's the type of someone Paisley, Adriana, and Jessica are, three University friends who are dumber than rocks. Follow in the average life of a dumb girl, living life blissfully unaware of the real world around them.​This story is comprised of actual events the author has encountered throughout her life, through various people she knew.
author: Lainey Rae Miller
